answers.answer: The high.blood pressure is just a big indacater for it

When I was pregnant with my first I was so swollen I could barely put flip flops on, and I couldn't wear my wedding ring at all. I also had really high blood pressure but they refused to diagnose me with preeclampsia! Why?? I have no idea they said it still wasn't bad enough..

With me, I was diagnosed with preeclampsia having high blood pressure and protein in my urine only. I think protein is a huge indicater as well as high blood pressure. Severe swelling can also be, I'd just tell all your symptoms and see what the dr says. My hospital said they have really strict guidelines on who or why they make the preeclampsia diagnosis. Because obviously they'd rather you not have it! Good luck!

question: In order to have preeclampsia do you necessarily need to have high blood pressure or is that.just a sign that some people have? Are there any tests other than having high blood pressure? Just asking because since yesterday my hands have constantly been falling asleep, I got a bit dizzy and been having blurred vision sometimes?
title: preeclampsia??
